rewards.description:
Join us in celebrating the launch of the 50th season for Marbles on Stream!

Marbles on Stream is the most welcoming stream interactive experience where a streamer can run the game and welcome anyone in their chat to participate with "!play". That's it!

Join in for exclusive prizes and keep an eye on our for how we evolve this event in the future. If you need assistance please join our discord. Discord.gg/pixelbypixelstudios
rewards.name: Marble Day 174 - Saturday

rewards.description: 🎮 Announcing Kakele Online's Epic Twitch Drops!  Embark on a unique journey in Kakele's realm. Dive into mystical lands, conquer quests, and enjoy our exciting Twitch Drops for enhanced gaming. Unlock rewards, including teleports, herbs, potions, and materials.  🕒 Timed Rewards: Enjoy cities Teleports, Ultra potions, Gold Refiner Kits and collect Dog Cards and Trophies.  💰 Prosperity Path: Gain Copper, Tin, Silver, Iron, Gold, Life Herbs, Mana Herbs for success. Accumulate Reputation Coins.  🎈 Grand Finale: End with an exclusive Twitch Drop and Bacon Extravaganza surprise! Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.  🌟 How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. Claim Rewards: Receive Twitch Drop notifications claim in the game app.  Influencers: To enable drops on your stream, email us!  Don't miss the chance to enrich your journey with Twitch Drops!
rewards.name: Kakele Online - December

rewards.description:
Starting Friday 6th December and running until Sunday 22nd December, Sea of Thieves is partnering with Twitch for Support A Streamer!

Viewers who purchase or gift two qualifying subscriptions will receive the Celestial Steed ship cosmetics, while those who purchase or gift three qualifying subscriptions will also receive the Obsidian Capstan. Keep an eye on the Sea of Thieves social channels for more details and news on other Festival of Giving events!

Want to take part? Don't forget to link your Twitch and Sea of Thieves accounts by following the steps here: https://www.seaofthieves.com/twitch-drops

For terms and conditions check out the Support A Streamer page here: https://www.seaofthieves.com/support-a-streamer
rewards.name: S14: Support A Streamer

rewards.description:
Join us for MR STUMBLE'S WINTER HOLIDAY ADVENTURE, a festive Twitch drop campaign packed with winter cheer and exclusive in-game rewards! Cozy up with your favorite Stumble Guys Twitch streamers and collect awesome holiday-themed items (Candy Canes Footsteps and Nutcracker Skin) just by watching! 

Connect your Twitch and Stumble Guys Scopely accounts to claim your rewards in-game and Tune in to your favorite Stumble Guys streamers during their live broadcasts and earn rewards! 
Don't forget to claim your rewards directly in your Twitch inventory (they will then be automatically added to your inventory in-game)

Note that the Twitch Drops are available to collect on mobile and console! (but Switch as for the time being the Scopely ID to link your account is not available on the platform)
rewards.name: MrStumble Winter Holidays
